Happiness of marriage

Source: R/gss_vars_49.R
hapmar.Rd

hapmar

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question A. Taking things all together, how would you describe your marriage? Would you say that your marriage is very happy, pretty happy, or not too happy?

Values

  • [1] very happy

  • [2] pretty happy

  • [3] not too happy

  • [NA(d)] don't know [NA(i)] iap [NA(j)] I don't have a job [NA(m)] dk, na, iap [NA(n)] no answer [NA(p)] not imputable [NA(r)] refused [NA(s)] skipped on web [NA(u)] uncodeable [NA(x)] not available in this release [NA(y)] not available in this year [NA(z)] see codebook

ballotsyears

Full1973, 1974, 1975, 1976, 1977, 1978, 1980, 1982, 1983, 1984, 1985, 1986, 1987
